alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:37PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Las Animas County through 315 PM MDT... At 236 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Delhi, or 36 miles northeast of Trinidad, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Las Animas County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
